key_title: Key to the species of Nymphaea

source.author: Jeanes, J.A.
source.title: Nymphaeaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae
source.citation: Modified from: Jeanes, J.A. (1996). Nymphaeaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Plant with horizontal rhizomes; flowers variously coloured, rarely yellow; leaves without brown markings
Plant usually with vertical rhizomes and horizontal stolons; flowers yellow; leaves often with brown markings
Rhizome vertical, stolons produced at apex; flowers held up to 12 cm above the water; sepals green
Rhizome vertical or horizontal, stolons produced along most of its length; flowers floating; sepals yellow and purple-brown
